pylsp.configurationSources.description: List of configuration sources to use.

pylsp.plugins.flake8.config.description: Path to the config file that will be the authoritative config source.

pylsp.plugins.flake8.exclude.description: List of files or directories to exclude.

pylsp.plugins.flake8.filename.description: Only check for filenames matching the patterns in this list.

pylsp.plugins.flake8.hangClosing.description: Hang closing bracket instead of matching indentation of opening bracket's line.

pylsp.plugins.flake8.ignore.description: List of errors and warnings to ignore (or skip).

pylsp.plugins.flake8.maxLineLength.description: Maximum allowed line length for the entirety of this run.

pylsp.plugins.flake8.perFileIgnores.description: A pairing of filenames and violation codes that defines which violations to ignore in a particular file, for example: `["file_path.py:W305,W304"]`).

pylsp.plugins.flake8.select.description: List of errors and warnings to enable.

pylsp.plugins.jedi.env_vars.description: Define environment variables for jedi.Script and Jedi.names.

pylsp.plugins.jedi.environment.description: Define environment for jedi.Script and Jedi.names.

pylsp.plugins.jedi_completion.include_pa.description: Auto-completes methods and classes with tabstops for each parameter.

pylsp.plugins.jedi_completion.include_cl.description: Adds class objects as a separate completion item.

pylsp.plugins.jedi_completion.resolve_at.description: How many labels and snippets (at most) should be resolved?

pylsp.plugins.jedi_completion.cache_for.description: Modules for which labels and snippets should be cached.

pylsp.plugins.jedi_definition.follow_imp.description: The goto call will follow imports.

pylsp.plugins.jedi_definition.follow_bui.description: If follow_imports is True will decide if it follow builtin imports.

pylsp.plugins.jedi_symbols.all_scopes.description: If True lists the names of all scopes instead of only the module namespace.

pylsp.plugins.jedi_symbols.include_impor.description: If True includes symbols imported from other libraries.

pylsp.plugins.mccabe.threshold.description: The minimum threshold that triggers warnings about cyclomatic complexity.

pylsp.plugins.preload.modules.description: List of modules to import on startup

pylsp.plugins.pycodestyle.exclude.description: Exclude files or directories which match these patterns.

pylsp.plugins.pycodestyle.filename.description: When parsing directories, only check filenames matching these patterns.

pylsp.plugins.pycodestyle.hangClosing.description: Hang closing bracket instead of matching indentation of opening bracket's line.

pylsp.plugins.pydocstyle.convention.description: Choose the basic list of checked errors by specifying an existing convention.

pylsp.plugins.pydocstyle.addIgnore.description: Ignore errors and warnings in addition to the specified convention.

pylsp.plugins.pydocstyle.addSelect.description: Select errors and warnings in addition to the specified convention.

pylsp.plugins.pydocstyle.match.description: Check only files that exactly match the given regular expression; default is to match files that don't start with 'test_' but end with '.py'.

pylsp.plugins.pydocstyle.matchDir.description: Search only dirs that exactly match the given regular expression; default is to match dirs which do not begin with a dot.

pylsp.plugins.pylint.executable.description: Executable to run pylint with. Enabling this will run pylint on unsaved files via stdin. Can slow down workflow. Only works with python3.

pylsp.rope.extensionModules.description: Builtin and c-extension modules that are allowed to be imported and inspected by rope.

pylsp.rope.ropeFolder.description: The name of the folder in which rope stores project configurations and data.  Pass `null` for not using such a folder at all.
